QE.Name: Quick Encounters
QE.Description:
Pin your Encounters to the Scene or in the Journal and run them with one click!

Method 1:

Place and select your hostile tokens and press the Quick Encounter button to save them into an Encounter Journal Entry. To run the Encounter, double-click the skull icon and press the Add to Combat Tracker button

Method 2:

Create a Journal Entry with your descriptive text. Drag Actors into the Journal Entry. Drag the Journal Entry to the desired Encounter location on your map. To run the Encounter, select the Map Note, or open the Encounter Journal Entry and click the Quick Encounters button
QE.CONTENT.AddADescription: Add a description of the quick encounter for you or your players:
QE.CONTENT.Instructions: When you close this Journal Entry, the selected tokens will be replaced with a single Encounter icon on the scene. When you want to run the Quick Encounter, double-click the combat icon and then press the Add Quick Encounter to Combat Tracker button.
